title: Question about Katarina's new Shunpo...

replies.body:
If she touches a Dagger she activates her passive, doing 300 damage and 1:1 scalaing on AP and bonus AD. It also resets the cooldown on Shunpo.

Shunpo tooltip says.

"If the target is an enemy, Katarina deals them magic damage. Otherwise, she deals the same magic damage to the nearest enemy in range."

It is single target.
